creditline: The Raymond and Ruth Reister Endowment for Art Acquisition and the Mary Ruth Weisel Endowment for Africa, Oceania, and the Americas
description: POSSIBLE ARSENIC TREATMENT- HANDLING SHOULD BE LIMITED UNTIL CONFIRMATION; rust-colored hide, with cowrie shell edging; pale blue, green and dark blue beads fringed and clustered across the top of apron; conch shell crosses at PR and PL; clusters of wooden beads with thing glass beads hang from C
title: Apron
